DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and IOP-lowering efficacy of Travoprost (0.004%) compared to Latanoprost (0.005%) in patients with chronic open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Travoprost 0.004% Compared to Latanoprost 0.005% in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma (OAG) or Ocular Hypertension (OHT)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients of any race and either sex with openangle glaucoma (with or without pigment dispersion or pseudoexfoliation component) or ocular hypertension.
